name: 張素薰
objective: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
schedule:
4 e1 Syllabus, 2011, First Semester
Week	CNN ( No. 96)	Language Skills
1	Introduction	Introduction
2	Staying on Top 	Finding Faults
3	Adding up Google+, Managing Millennials	Your Talk
4	Look Back at Big Blue	Self-examination
5	Tools of the Hacker Trade, Final Countdown	Impromptu Delivery
6	Carbon-Neutral Copenhangen	Outline Delivery
7	CGI Killed the Video Star	Manuscript Delivery
8	Yao Calls it Quits	Memorized Delivery
9	Taking a Bite of the Big Apple	Mid-Term
10	Total Control, Modern Mad Man	The Voice
11	Battered but Not Broken, Chaotic Bangkok	The Voice
12	Group Powerpoint Presentation—Introduction a Scenic Place	Clarity
13	Protecting the Pangolin, Aliens of the Deep	Self-Evaluation
14	Hamburgerology 101, Home Shopping Chic	Word Choice
15	Audition Disaster	Word Meaning
16		
17	Playlet	
18	Final examination	Final examination
scorePolicy:
Assessment:
1.	Weekly tests and Attendance (20 points maximum deduction). 80%
2.	Oral reports and presentations. 20%
